tool_description:
Submit your data as HTML and get a PDF file. Choose whether you want to have a PDF file as portrait or landscape with My favorite PDF <3
Fast, flexible and easy.
name: My favorite PDF ❤️
title: My favorite PDF ❤️

api_list.name: HTML
api_list.description: Submit your data as an HTML string

required_parameters.name: orientation
required_parameters.description: Specify whether you want your PDF file as **portrait** or **landscape**

optional_parameters.name: data
optional_parameters.description: Write your data here in HTML-format.
